page.shortlink: tabbed ui properties tabbed ui properties style name property
page.description: Click the button to select a new style, or edit the existing style.
page.important: If any of the Grids shown in the TabbedUI use a different style than this style, their styles must be listed in the 'Additional Grid styles' section below. You can also use <ProjectStyle> or <Session:varname> (V11 and above)
